item.description:
For More Info Click Here

Boston Area Real Estate Investors Association

Where: Hilton Garden Inn, 420 Totten Pond Rd., Waltham, MA

December 20, 2007 - Monthly Meeting

Network, Network, Network! Party, Party, Party!

A full evening of networking and a holiday party to boot!

5:30 - 6:30 PM - Networking and Meet the Vendors

6:30 PM - Meeting

7:30 PM - More time to network!

Location: Hilton Garden Inn, 420 Totten Pond Rd, Waltham, Ma.

This has been our first season, and you have all made it a very successful first few months. We want to celebrate, and hope you will join us! Bring your business cards, and your Holiday Spirit! You will have almost the entire evening to talk to all those people you haven't been able to speak with!

Networking, prizes and FUN! See you there!

group.name: The Boston Area Real Estate Investors Association

item.name: The Boston Area Real Estate Investors Association December Meetup
